```{r, results = "asis"}
if ({{plot}} == "Volcano raw P") {
  x <- data$logFC
  y <- data$negLog10rawP
  xlab <- "logFC"
  ylab <- "negLog10rawP"
  status <- data$sig.PVal
  cols_to_display <- c("Gene_name", "Description", "uniprot_id", "logFC", "p", "adjusted_p")
} else if ({{plot}} == "Volcano adjusted P") {
  x <- data$logFC
  y <- data$negLog10adjP
  xlab <- "logFC"
  ylab <- "negLog10adjP"
  status <- data$sig.FDR
  cols_to_display <- c("Gene_name", "Description", "uniprot_id", "logFC", "p", "adjusted_p")
} else if ({{plot}} == "MD raw P") {
  x <- data$AveExpr
  y <- data$logFC
  xlab <- "AveExpr"
  ylab <- "logFC"
  status <- data$sig.PVal
  cols_to_display <- c("Gene_name", "Description", "uniprot_id", "AveExpr", "logFC", "p", "adjusted_p")
} else if ({{plot}} == "MD adjusted P") {
  x <- data$AveExpr
  y <- data$logFC
  xlab <- "AveExpr"
  ylab <- "logFC"
  status <- data$sig.FDR
  cols_to_display <- c("Gene_name", "Description", "uniprot_id", "AveExpr", "logFC", "p", "adjusted_p")
} else {
  stop("Invalid plot option")
}
```
